message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product for a great price of $115.  I think it would be perfect for you and I'm excited to see if we can make a deal.
Hi Alice, Thanks for the offer, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. I'd be willing to pay $105 for the product.  Let me know what you think!

Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I want to be fair. How about we meet in the middle at $110? It's a fantastic product that I know you'll get a lot of value out of.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $110 is closer, I'm still looking to save a bit more.  How about we split the difference and go with $107.50?  I'm really hoping to make this deal work.
